title: America New York RI Wang Food Group Recalls Sausage Products Due To Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: EDITORS NOTE: This release is being reissued as an expansion of the September 15, 2017, recall to include additional products and production dates. Details of this release were also updated to reflect a change in poundage. WASHINGTON, Sept. 27, 2017 America New York RI Wang...

establishment.name: America New York Ri Wang Food Group

impacted_products: •25-lb. institutional pack of “Beef Balls,” with the following lot codes and package dates:
•25-lb. institutional pack of “Beef Tendon Balls,” with the following lot codes and package dates:
•25-lb. institutional pack of “Pork Patty Balls,” with the following lot codes and package dates:
